amendment.description: To require a report on the location of Coast Guard facilities and assets in the Federal City Project in New Orleans, Louisiana.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4648 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4648 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S7470-7472; text: CR S7470) To require a report on the location of Coast Guard facilities and assets in the Federal City Project in New Orleans, Louisiana.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4648 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4648 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Landrieu.
